about_the_game:
Get an early access to the new chapter of Vigor, now available on PC! The landscape of the Outlands is as deadly as it is beautiful, so get ready to take on the challenges.

Be one of the first to try this experience before the full release. Arm yourself with top-tier gear and forge your path as the true prodigy of shattered Norway!

The pack includes:


  • Exclusive Title: Platform Pioneer
  • Exclusive Prodigy Uniform
  • 2x SVU + 60x ammo (7.62x54)
  • 2x Remy M870 + 40x ammo (Shotgun Shell)
  • 2x ADR-97 + 300x ammo (5.7x28)
  • 2x L85A1 + 180x ammo (5.56x45 NATO)
  • 3x M249 + 900x ammo (5.56x45 NATO)
  • 3x B93 Raffica + 180x ammo (9x19 Parabellum)
  • 2x The John
  • 3x Mortar Strike
  • 3x Armor Plate
  • 3x Smoke Grenade
  • 3x M67 Frag Grenade
  • 3x Portable Signals Detector
  • 4x Adrenaline Shot
  • 4x M84 Flash Grenade
  • 4x Improvised Mine
  • 5x Caffeine
  • 5x Jammer
  • 5x Antibiotics
  • 6x Painkiller
  • 6x Decoy
  • 6x Alarm Trap


This pack may only be purchased once per account and is available for a limited time during Early Access.

The content of this pack will automatically transfer from early access to the fully released game.
